text: Aap keh dijiye kay ehal-e-kitab! Tum dar asal kissi cheez per nahi jab tak kay toraat aur injeel ko aur jo kuch tumhari taraf tumharay rab ki taraf say utara gaya hai qaeem na kerojo kuch aap ki janib aap kay rab ki taraf say utra hai woh inn mein say bohton ko shararat aur inkaar mein aur bhi barhaye ga hi to aap inn kafiron per ghumgeen na hon
